snippet: A psychiatrist urges greater use of self-care strategies like exercise, nutrition and mind-body techniques to treat chronic conditions. Readers are invited to respond.
lead_paragraph: A psychiatrist urges greater use of self-care strategies like exercise, nutrition and mind-body techniques to treat chronic conditions. Readers are invited to respond.

headline.main: Invitation to a Dialogue: Alternative Therapies
